Sep 4, 2002

The 9th Circuit reversals stem from being too law-abiding, not too liberal

“In fact, while it is frequently reported that 17 of the 24 active judges were appointed by Democrats, this sly insinuation about the politics of the court is simply mistaken. Of the 24 active judges, 12 are clearly conservatives, six are moderates, and only six could fairly be characterized as liberals.” law.com
